caption: Would not recommend at all! I paid for a class and they kicked me out in the middle because I don't speak good French and didn't understand what the teacher was doing. Extremely unprofessional and rude!!
Best salsa School in Paris. Well done to all the team üôèüî• ‚Ä¶

I joined the school about 2 weeks ago and it has been great so far! (I spent around 16 hours/week there so far). The front desk staff is lovely and very welcoming, everyone of them. They offer several options in terms of memberships but nothing was meeting my situation. Fortunately the owner understood my need and we came up with a good solution :) If you are new to the Latin dances and don't know how to dance in general, the level 1 classes will be good for you but if you already know how to move your body following the music and are good at memorizing steps, work a bit harder and move to the next level ;) because you'll feel a bit bored otherwise, but well, that's normal for group classes and it'll be the same everywhere. Some teachers realized the difference level in the same group and even gave some more advanced steps to the most confortable ones :))) If you are already a dancer I think you will still learn a lot, I had the chance to join the level 2 classes and it's already a way higher level, and they have 4 levels! All teachers are good at what they are doing and I met some really nice people there already  Keep up the good work!! üôåüôåüíÉüï∫

I have been dancing at EDLT since 7 or 8 months now and I could hardly be more satisfied. The teachers are great, friendly, pedagogical and they really adapt themselves to the student. The staff is very welcoming and helpful. For instance they allowed me to extend the validity of my subscription because I couldn't practice during COVID (since I wasn't vaccinated). To sum up, a great place to learn Latin dances !

Fantastic salsa classes. We both have two left feet and have never danced any kind of latin dance before, but their beginner classes were really good for us, with very clear and simple instruction, personal attention and good music to help us with beat. After two months of weekly classes, we were comfortably dancing beginner moves in salsa bars during our trip to Cuba. Would definitely recommend to anyone interested in learning salsa in a clear and methodical way, but also looking to have some fun doing so (the teachers we had were all kind and funny).
Great environment and super talented dance instructors (special shot out to the bachata and salsa teachers)  Latin native approved ;D
Enjoy every single class here! Great environment, high level professors and a lot of fun!
Good vibes, nice atmosphere, professional teachers! Best Latin school ever :) gracias chic@s
Learning to dance is not easy - here it is alot easier üï∫üèºüòâ ‚Ä¶

I took part in an Afro dance class with friends, and we all loved it! The atmosphere was warm and friendly, the team very welcoming and professional. The teacher was great: he knew how to put us at ease, motivate us and transmit his beautiful energy to us. Beginner or already comfortable on the track, everything is done to ensure that everyone has an excellent time. A school that exudes passion for Latin and tropical dances, with varied and quality courses. We will definitely come back to try other styles! Thank you again for this great experience! üíÉüï∫‚ú®

I came with my partner and my sister to discover salsa and bachata, and we had an exceptional evening! The teachers are both passionate and very educational, which makes learning pleasant and motivating. I highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to learn or improve their skills in these dances.
A school that organizes and provides very good service for private lessons. I had lessons with Vivi, an excellent teacher, I learned a lot with her, very good know-how! I recommend!

I am delighted with my experience at this school. Friendly and fun atmosphere!  Very high quality classes, the coaches are not only great dancers but also very teachers. The subscription allows you to participate in different classes, ideal for progressing in several dance styles. A special thank you for the quality of the Puerto Rican salsa classes that I love and the warm welcome from the director who always listens to the students. Thanks to the whole team!

Beginner in salsa after 1 year of practice once a week in an association in Ile de France.  I didn't feel at all comfortable in my practice, I lacked technical knowledge, confidence in my guidance, and letting go. Even though I knew the passes, I didn't know how to be comfortable, or how to sequence them or mix them.  So I was looking for a dance school that would make me gain self-confidence and help me progress gently and educationally, while covering all the basics.  After testing a few, I was won over by the very high human and educational quality of the teachers at this school. They all have a different pedagogy and way of teaching, but they group together on the theme of the week which is to be worked on.  For example, one coach will place more emphasis on tempo, another on the placement of the body in space, another on guidance, etc... well you understand, they are all extremely complementary.  We really feel like we're in a private lesson with them. They provide attention, expertise and gentleness that can only help you progress.  For all these reasons I recommend this school, for all the dances it offers.  Sebastian
Excellent course with very clear teachers, fabulous people and a great atmosphere! We feel that we can evolve quickly and in the best conditions! I recommend!

I have been taking Bachata classes at the Ecole des Danses Latines Tropicales for two years now.  Nothing to complain about! The courses are: ‚Ä¢ available for all levels, from beginner to advanced, almost every day of the week ‚Ä¢ taught by good teachers with different pedagogies and styles, which allows everyone to find what they need from the moment they arrive at school, but also throughout their progression ‚Ä¢ always in a friendly and pleasant atmosphere.

Hey, I had never practiced dancing in a school before entering this one... since last September I have regularly taken a weekly salsa class with my partner. Overall: what a joy!  A very attentive "reception" team, very educational teachers, the practitioners are friendly, perfect progression because the sessions are very well divided and adapted.  Depending on your grant, you have matching formulas, payment facilities and postponements of sessions if you are absent.  Everything is perfect - thank you to everyone you met during this year 2023/2024  I highly recommend  See you soon for season 2
Just great! First group bachata course with Patrick. A great atmosphere at your learning pace, great group energy!  I highly recommend this dance school!
A school where it is good to let go. The teachers are very friendly and educational. The rhythm comes very easily. Absolutely worth testing and adopting of course!
Excellent school! Lots of choice of dances, good teachers, beautiful places, well located near Bastille, what more could you want? I recommend !
Perfect. Great evening. Awesome team. Very friendly... Total change of scenery Thank you for this moment to repeat.. I won't be long in subscribing

Questionable business practices...  After signing up for a subscription without realizing the 10-month commitment, it was impossible to go back... despite my numerous interactions with the service. They came to threaten me with bailiffs... Result: I paid around ‚Ç¨500 more than I should have. An experience which spoiled my pleasure, as you can imagine, me who had come to have fun.  Pay attention to your wallet. Clearly here, business takes precedence over the well-being of the customer. I strongly advise against it.

I did my kizomba & bachata discovery classes on Saturday, followed by the evening. I stayed until the end. It's been a long time since I had fun like that!!!!!!! It‚Äôs a certainty, I‚Äôm going to sign up. The staff is friendly, the teachers are cool. I loved it.

The tropical Latin dance school is a very enriching experience that I recommend to anyone interested in couple dances.  When I registered, I was looking for solid training to enjoy Salsa and Bachata evenings. I subscribed to a freedom card for a few courses before quickly investing in an unlimited subscription. The cost of this subscription is largely offset by the quality of the education offered; this on condition of investing energy and time.  I took lessons with all the teachers, each in their own way gave me advice, their own pedagogy. This diversity is a plus in the training, as is the "learning cycle" system which allows Salsa to acquire the figures step by step.  The school is also a way to connect to Latin American, Caribbean and African cultures, it is not just about dance but about styles, music, social relationships, stories woven around these cultures.  Another positive point is flexibility, whether via the freedom card allowing you to adjust your schedule or via the opening of the school on Sundays where 2-hour courses are offered.  The evenings organized by the school are ideal for getting started. We can express ourselves freely and gain confidence, especially since we dance with partners who take classes with us.  It is with great pleasure that I post this review, hoping that it will motivate whoever reads it to take the plunge!  PS: When you open the school door, love is never far away...
Dynamic school with friendly staff. I encourage you to come to the evenings and take your classes there.
Very good experience. Listening and encouraging teachers. I recommend Jean Philippe, Isa√Øe and Gabriele.
Pleasant teacher full of joie de vivre who makes you want to learn and puts you at ease! (Puerto Rican Salsa)
A great dance school with experienced teachers and teachers!! And what‚Äôs more, it‚Äôs accessible for super beginners! THANKS

The tropical Latin dance school is a place of resources, energy and dazzling smiles! The schedule is rich and flexibility is an asset to my organization: I have the freedom to choose according to my availability, which has introduced me to several dances; the team is welcoming, caring and the practice is done in a good mood: from the reception, to the teachers and even the manager whom we meet regularly; I renew with pleasure, like every year!
Very warm welcome. It was a very good evening.
Excellent establishment, I highly recommend for all fans of Latin and tropical music!!!
The best school in Paris, quite simply. Unique in France
Great dance school! A wild evening and quality staff!

Pedagogy, good humor and kindness. Perfect school for learning the basics of Latin dances and also improving your skills. The teachers are top notch and the quality of the teaching is there! I recommend :)
Welcoming place for anyone wanting to start practicing new dances :)
